item.title: Better Home & Finance shares soar more than 40% after Eric Jackson of Opendoor fame recommends it
item.description: The EMJ Capital founder called Better Home "the Shopify of mortgages" and said the company is rebuilding a $15 trillion industry from scratch with AI.

item.title: Pfizer just paid a lot of cash to catch up in the GLP race. Why its stock is higher
item.description: Pfizer is spending more than $7 billion to buy biotech Metsera to try to catch cup in the obesity drug market.

item.title: The generational opportunity in muni bonds is ‘slipping away’ as yields fall and supply dwindles, strategist says
item.description: Investors who want to snap up attractive income on municipal bonds may not want to wait much longer, according to strategist Tom Kozlik.

item.title: The charts on this telehealth stock point to strong gains ahead, according to Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the technical outlook on this telehealth name.

item.title: Bad Bunny concerts boost Puerto Rico GDP by $400 million, estimates Wells Fargo, boosting this stock
item.description: Puerto Rico's local economy got a massive boost from Bad Bunny's Bad Bunny's 31-date residency, giving Popular a lift as well, according to Wells Farg...
